message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to own this unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value and what I've researched about the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of $925000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $925000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product to you for $975000. I believe this is the best price we can agree on, considering the value it brings to you.

I'm not willing to go up to $975000. I'm still thinking of $925000 as a fair price for the product. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price, but I'd like to try to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
